overview: Two men being questioned in a police station on Christmas Eve both confess to the murder of a cop. With both stories seeming plausible, an investigator is called in to determine which suspect is telling the truth - and why the other one is lying. Crime drama, starring James Earl Jones and Jason Bateman.
tagline: One murder. One perfect candidate. One unlikely killer. One chance to separate fact from fiction.
title: Confessions: Two Faces of Evil
